width.name: width
width.label: Desktop width/default
width.description: Number of columns to occupy in desktop viewport and by default in all other viewports other than desktop. Defaults to 1 when left blank.

tabletWidth.name: tabletWidth
tabletWidth.label: Tablet width
tabletWidth.description: Number of columns to occupy in tablet viewport. You can leave it blank if it is the same as defined under Desktop width/default

mobileWidth.name: mobileWidth
mobileWidth.label: Mobile width
mobileWidth.description: Number of columns to occupy in mobile viewport. You can leave it blank if it is the same as defined under Desktop width/default
